author: gbrown
msg: Change return type of PutQuery to Boolean (HTTP specification allows PUT to create a resource on the server; this flag indicates whether or not a resource was created).

author: dwoods
msg: OPENJPA-1524 Update JNDI lookup to find TransactionManager when running in Apache Aries.  Still need to implement a better solution for non-Aries based OSGi environments.

author: johnh
msg: Rewrites relative links found in HTML to being absolute. This implementation may
serve as an alternative to the use of a <base> tag.
No Gadget/ContentRewriter is introduced in this CL as yet.
